body: Are we allowed to upload videos containing avicus people in a minecraft related environment not on a competor server? I have a video of a survival with merlin, can I post it here?
body_tagged: Are we allowed to upload videos containing avicus people in a minecraft related environment not on a competor server? I have a video of a survival with merlin, can I post it here?
title: Upload...

replies.body: Nope can't be a different server.
replies.body_tagged: Nope can't be a different server.

replies.body:
You can only post things related to Avicus in the Media sub forum.
However you can post non Avicus related videos in the Off Topic section.

Correct me If I'm wrong.
replies.body_tagged:
